about_the_game:
In the aftermath of a horrific galaxy-wide terrorist attack and war on the Empire by a mysterious rebellion, a highly decorated Officer is transferred to Special Operations Squad Nu under unusual circumstances. Charged with rooting out a Rebel espionage ring, the Officer soon finds himself dragged into a world of Imperial intrigue and politics. His squad is filled with highly skilled individuals each with their own agenda, the Officer will need to earn the loyalty and perhaps even the love of his team to make it through his mission… alive.



Color of My Sound is a perfect blend of serious storytelling and meaningful eroticism. Characters are driven by their own agendas and personal background. Throughout the story, relationships will slowly blossom as the team must come together and take on ever escalating threats of conspiracy and political intrigue.

Playing as the Officer, a war hero traumatized by an event that made him the center of a galactic conspiracy, you will lead a team of specialists assembled from various factions of the Empire to unravel the mystery behind the Rebellion that has broken many lives. But tread carefully, not everyone can be trusted...



As an interactive visual novel, Color of My Sound offers a carefully planned choice system that will not overwhelm you with muddled choices with impossible to know consequences. Instead, the choices will gradually progress from flavor to small variations to branching paths as the story unfolds. As the stake escalates, so too will the impact of your choices.

The game also features a robust Codex system that expands with lore entries and character dossiers as you learn about them. With the Lore Tooltips feature, you will never be lost should you take a break from the story and have forgotten details about the world.
